APS_BindConf_t confirm

Detailed Description

The structure used to hold parameters for APS_BindReq()

A pointer to an instance of this type should be passed to APS_BindReq() function. The structure conforms to the APSME-BIND.request primitive defined in ZigBee specification.

Definition at line 83 of file apsmeBind.h.

Field Documentation

ExtAddr_t APS_BindReq_t::srcAddr

[LE] The source IEEE address for the binding entry.

Definition at line 86 of file apsmeBind.h.

Endpoint_t APS_BindReq_t::srcEndpoint

The source endpoint for the binding entry. Valid range: 0x01-0xFE.

Definition at line 88 of file apsmeBind.h.

ClusterId_t APS_BindReq_t::clusterId

[LE] The identifier of the cluster on the source device that is to be bound to the destination device.

Definition at line 91 of file apsmeBind.h.

APS_AddrMode_t APS_BindReq_t::dstAddrMode

The addressing mode for the destination address. This parameter can take a value from the following list:

  • APS_GROUP_ADDRESS - 16-bit dst.group is used to identify the destination group
  • APS_EXT_ADDRESS - the destination node is identified with extended address; dst.unicast.extAddr holds the extended address, dst.unicast.endpoint holds the endpoint

Definition at line 98 of file apsmeBind.h.

APS_DstBindAddr_t APS_BindReq_t::dst

[LE] The destination address for the binding entry.

Definition at line 100 of file apsmeBind.h.

APS_BindConf_t APS_BindReq_t::confirm

The field to keep the result of the request
